display_long_description:
Move your arms and body to stay aloft and avoid obstacles in this colorful, bird-brained VR racing adventure. Whether you’re a seasoned VR gamer or a first-time flier, Flock Party is designed to be comfortable and fun for anyone to pick up and enjoy.

-FIND YOUR FLOCK-
Help guide your bird back to its wayward flock in Flock Party’s single-player campaign. The campaign features 18 courses that weave through grassy meadows, steep canyons, menacing castles, towering mountains, dense jungles, and more. The environments become increasingly challenging to navigate as you progress through the courses, requiring you to use all your skills to make it to the finish line.

-MULTIPLAYER-
Help guide your bird back to its wayward flock in Flock Party’s single-player campaign. The campaign features 18 courses that weave through grassy meadows, steep canyons, menacing castles, towering mountains, dense jungles, and more. The environments become increasingly challenging to navigate as you progress through the courses, requiring you to use all your skills to make it to the finish line.

-CUSTOMIZE YOUR BIRD-
Make your bird stand out with a range of customization options. You can change the shape of its body, eyes, wings, beak, and feet, choose different feather patterns and color options, and add accessories like hats and glasses – the sky’s the limit!
